display_long_description:
Pet Doctor is an engaging VR and arcade idle game where players take on the role of a veterinarian, responsible for treating a variety of animals. From mending broken bones to diagnosing infections, players utilize their medical skills to help their patients recover and thrive. As the game progresses, players can expand their clinic with new equipment, enhancing their ability to care for more animals and tackle increasingly complex cases.

With numerous levels and daily challenges, Pet Doctor offers a rewarding gameplay experience that combines strategic planning and engaging challenges. As players advance, they unlock new animals, tools, and clinic upgrades, adding depth to the game. The game's captivating visuals and accessible gameplay mechanics ensure it is enjoyable for a wide audience, particularly those who are passionate about animals.

Whether you're immersed in the VR environment or enjoying the idle gameplay mode, Pet Doctor provides the perfect blend of relaxation and excitement as you build your clinic and care for your animal patients on their road to recovery!
